duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain cloud-based, state-of-the-art search solutions on top of customers’ infrastructure in a scalable way.
Implement and maintain a highly scalable, highly reliable cloud-native user interface and underlying microservices.
Drive ongoing innovation of global cloud architecture and distributed systems.
Develop and maintain core libraries, infrastructure, and search engines.
Coaching and leading mid-level and junior staff in the design, implementation, and execution of highly technical development projects.
Work collaboratively with Product Managers, engineers, designers, and stakeholders to continuously iterate on products and drive consensus.

education_certification.credential: B.S. degree in Computer Science or a directly related field, or equivalent work experience
